name: Moai Massacre
description:
In Moai Massacre you’ve been given a date, a location, and a time. On entry through the skylight, you spot dozens of Moai, at Moai-Con, with some being more… disliked by others. With bounties on their heads can you spot the odd one out and put a bullet between their stone-covered eyes?!

Huge thanks to the team who all made this possible, this game wouldn’t be possible without you all! So proud of the final outcome.
